column4: Need advice on PHP development environment... need to be able to work on win7 machine at work and mac os x at home... running Vbox now on hosts, but managing multiple servers is becoming a nightmare... any suggestions?
I suggest #PHP (and Quanta+ on Cygwin in windows)
What I actually do is to run an X-server on the box I'm developing on and connect to the server over ssh and run quanta from that.
im thinking hosted cloud dev environment..? know any cases of others opting for this?
